summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackCocokindâ€™s Calming Magnesium Facial Mist reduces visible redness, clarifies breakout-prone skin & supports the moisture barrier to keep your complexion clear and comfortable all day. Spritz the ultra-fine mist anytime to de-stress & refresh - during your routine, over makeup, or post-workout.
details: DetailsBenefitsCalms stressed, reactive skinVisibly reduces rednessSupports a clear & balanced complexionGreat for breakout-prone and sensitive skinSpritz anytime to de-stress and refresh skin throughout the day, even over makeup!Clinically tested for sensitive skinItem 2641102How To UseSpray onto clean skin AM / PM to help clarify and support the skin barrier. Follow with serum(s) and moisturizer. Spritz throughout the day to help calm stressed skin with magnesium.IngredientsWater/Eau, Sea Silt Extract, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Glycerin, Magnesium Pca, Zinc Pca, Sodium Pca, Manganese Pca, Polylysine, Nelumbo Nucifera Flower Water, Nymphaea Caerulea Flower Water, Biosaccharide Gum-2, Maltodextrin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Citric Acid, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Gluconate, Sodium Benzoate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Hydroxide.
how_to_use: Spray onto clean skin AM / PM to help clarify and support the skin barrier. Follow with serum(s) and moisturizer. Spritz throughout the day to help calm stressed skin with magnesium.

reviews.headline: I wouldn't buy this again
reviews.comments: There is an influencer on TikTok that's raving about this product saying it changed her life and because she doesn't have rosacea, I don't see how that's true. Be wary of the reviews that are over the top positive about this product because yes, it's a nice fine mist that feels like water on the skin that has some soothing ingredients for calming Inflammation but you don't necessarily need this unless you have rosacea. There are much more affordable mists with larger quantities for less money out there that could potentially change your skin for the better Or heal a damaged barrier but this isn't anything special in my opinion.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: This whole brand is a new holy grail for me but especially this mist! It has helped with my redness in just a month. I'm very pleased with is product and would definitely recommend.

reviews.headline: You need this mist!
reviews.comments: You guys, i have suffered with HORRIBLE facial eczema and when i tell yoi this product helps soothe it and hydrate my skin at the same time, it 100% does, it has literally changed my skin for the better!

reviews.headline: Love it soo much
reviews.comments: I got this face mist to add to my skincare routine and I absolutely love it, it really does help with redness and hydration and it also does so much more for ur skin, I will definitely continue to buy this and the price is amazing too!

reviews.headline: This mist is different from the rest!
reviews.comments:
I've tried several other facial mists and I've been mostly disappointed because they either irritate or dry out my skin. This one actually calms the redness & irritation that I sometimes have after using actives like azelaic acid, retinoids, and vitamin C serum. As I was researching some of the ingredients that were unfamiliar to me, I found that this formula is packed full of ingredients for reducing inflammation, healing and regenerating skin cells,   and stimulating collagen production. All of these things are also good for helping your skin retain water, which I have definitely noticed when I use it. 

I do not use it over makeup. Because when I have, I thought that it made my face too wet and I didn't like how it made my makeup look. I use it primarily during skin prep and during my nighttime routine. 

I will repurchase only when it's on sale or when Ihave a coupon. I think it is on the expensive side,  but I really like it and what it does for my skin.

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: It's works well for my acne prone skin. Very calming

reviews.headline: Amazing on Face AND Body
reviews.comments: This has to be one of my new favorite products of the year. I have eczema and this has calmed my face and body down after long days in the sun. I've already purchased my second bottle. Highly recommend for my sensitive skin friends!

reviews.headline: LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!
reviews.comments: This is such a great, easy product to use! This mist has calmed down my skin so much - i use it in the morning, afternoon and night. My skin used to have small breakouts and i've noticed that they disappeared and have not come back since I started using this mist!

reviews.headline: I LOVEEE
reviews.comments: def am gonna repurchase when finished!

reviews.headline: love this product
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this product! It's SO refreshing and feels so good on! The atomizer is actually really good and the mist is very fine. It's great to spray on your face throughout the day and it's also great on sunburns. Totally recommend.

reviews.headline: I LOVE IT
reviews.comments:
There are many sprays i have used on my face for skin prep in the morning and at night, and this is bu far one of the best ones!! It helps alleviate any redness or irritation on my skin. Especially on my cheeks!! 
It immediately calms everything!!

reviews.headline: Interesting new idea
reviews.comments: I have redness in my t-zone and was excited to see a spray, instead of a lotion, etc., that could tackle that.  Even when I read in the description that it takes a while for it to work, I decided to give it a try.  It's a very fine mist that doesn't do much to cool the skin during a hot flash, but I'm going to keep it,  in hopes that with use it will eventually keep my redness at a minimum!

reviews.headline: Calming, cooling, cocokind
reviews.comments: A wonderful toner tier most, calms my skin (combo leaning oily, not very sensitive skin). Felt refreshing and I use it throughout the day as a little nice mist to refresh and calm. Coco kind has killing it lately
